rows.label: qst200203_0010
rows.name: You must be Glen, right?

rows.label: qst200203_0020
rows.name:
You're every bit as overbearing
as I'd heard.

rows.label: qst200203_0030
rows.name: So what if I am?

rows.label: qst200203_0040
rows.name:
You're the ones with some explainin' to do!
Why did you attack us?

rows.label: qst200203_0050
rows.name:
Well, when we heard about you...
It got us a little bit curious.

rows.label: qst200203_0060
rows.name: Heard about me?

rows.label: qst200203_0070
rows.name: Yeah. 'Bout how you're a righteous Blade.

rows.label: qst200203_0080
rows.name:
You really think you can save people with
that childish sense of justice?

rows.label: qst200203_0090
rows.name:
You ask the dumbest questions!
Of course I can save people!

rows.label: qst200203_0100
rows.name:
...But is that true?
Or is it just wishful thinking?

rows.label: qst200203_0110
rows.name: What're you saying to me, scumbag?

rows.label: qst200203_0120
rows.name:
Justice doesn't help anyone in the
real world. It just gets in their way.

rows.label: qst200203_0130
rows.name: I thought I might teach you that lesson myself.

rows.label: qst200203_0140
rows.name:
You wanna teach me?
You don't know crap!

rows.label: qst200203_0150
rows.name:
I WILL use this power of justice,
and I WILL save people! Lots of them!

rows.label: qst200203_0160
rows.name:
Ugh, could you turn down the heat?
It's pretty difficult to bear.

rows.label: qst200203_0170
rows.name:
If your "flame of justice" burns any hotter,
we'll have a heatwave on our hands.

rows.label: qst200203_0180
rows.name:
Listen to me, Glen.
If you want to stick with this whole justice thing...

rows.label: qst200203_0190
rows.name:
You should look into a girl called
Harghal, in Avaritia.

rows.label: qst200203_0200
rows.name: A girl? What about her?

rows.label: qst200203_0210
rows.name:
She was a dancing girl in Bahn's little sideshow.
Do some digging, and you'll understand.

rows.label: qst200203_0220
rows.name:
Then we'll all see how much your justice
is really worth...
